tool.name: SAGA.tin_tools.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTIN False output_data_POINTS $output_data_POINTS output_data_CENTER $output_data_CENTER output_data_EDGES $output_data_EDGES output_data_TRIANGLES $output_data_TRIANGLES output_data_POLYGONS $output_data_POLYGONS name SAGA.tin_tools.3 TIN $TIN prefer $prefer response $response outputType_POINTS $OutputSection_POINTS.outputType_POINTS transmissionMode_POINTS $OutputSection_POINTS.transmissionMode_POINTS outputType_CENTER $OutputSection_CENTER.outputType_CENTER transmissionMode_CENTER $OutputSection_CENTER.transmissionMode_CENTER outputType_EDGES $OutputSection_EDGES.outputType_EDGES transmissionMode_EDGES $OutputSection_EDGES.transmissionMode_EDGES outputType_TRIANGLES $OutputSection_TRIANGLES.outputType_TRIANGLES transmissionMode_TRIANGLES $OutputSection_TRIANGLES.transmissionMode_TRIANGLES outputType_POLYGONS $OutputSection_POLYGONS.outputType_POLYGONS transmissionMode_POLYGONS $OutputSection_POLYGONS.transmissionMode_POLYGONS

param.name: TIN
param.label: TIN
param.help: TIN The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml, json

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_POINTS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_POINTS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_CENTER
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CENTER
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_EDGES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_EDGES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_TRIANGLES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TRIANGLES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_POLYGONS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_POLYGONS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Converts a TIN data set to shapes layers.
